text: Ia bar, Godɨn Duamɨn otivaghirir mɨzebav kɨmasa, kɨ ifonge. Egh ia uaghan Godɨn otivir akabar gun mɨkɨmasa, kɨ guizbangɨra bar ifonge. Gumazitam Godɨn Duamɨn otivaghirir mɨzebav kɨmtɨ, dagh ighavkɨnamin gumazitam ikɨva akabagh ighavkɨntɨma, siosɨn aven itir adarazi gavgavim iniam. Akam ighavkɨnamin gumaziba puvatɨghtɨ, eghtɨ gumazir Godɨn otivir akabar gun mɨgeim, an ingangarim bar ekevegha, a gumazir Godɨn Duamɨn otivaghirir mɨzebav geimɨn ingangarim gafira.
